title: ooyir iru kaiyil
sahitya:
uyir irukkaiyil unnai maravEnE nAn uyirukkum
uyirAm shrI lalitE


anupallavi

Ayiram tuyaramuTren manam tavippinum
AyuLLaLavum migha sukham anubhavippinum

caraNam

gati yAr-enakkenru matiyum padara ennai ati
dayaiyuDan nIyE AdarittAyE
                        gati nAnukkenrum Adiyai ozhi kaNNE bhaktiyuDan
vAzhgena vAzhttina tAi maNiyE
